basicImpl.model.generators

Class SimpleGenWithReplGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • basicImpl.model.generators.AbstractSimpleGenerator
      • basicImpl.model.generators.SimpleGenWithReplGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRandomLatinSquareGenerator, IRandomStructureGenerator

    public class SimpleGenWithReplGraph
extends AbstractSimpleGenerator
    This class implements the method with the replacement graph. The generation is done row by row. When a conflict occurs, a replacement graph is constructed and the row is fixed to make room for the conflicting element. This is the best method of the SimpleGen-type algorithms. It's very efficient and finishes in polynomial type.
    Author:
    igallego
